entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
